get.description:
Retrieve call history for a call history ID.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:read:call_history:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callHistoryId
parameters.description: Unique call history ID.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`    Successfully retrieved call history for the specified call history ID.

call_history_id.description: Unique identifier for the call history record.

transcript.example: [00:00] 16315423526: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone.\n[00:05] 16315423526: Please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.

type.description: Record type enum: UPCOMING, CALLED, SNOOZED, HISTORY, NO_CALL_LIST, REMOVED, CALL_BACK_INBOUND

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who made the call.

call_list_id.description: Unique identifier of the call list.

calling_number.description: Phone number used to make the call.

complete_called_number.description: Complete phone number with country code.

create_time.description: Time when the call record was created in UTC (ISO 8601 format).

start_time.description: Time when the call started in UTC (ISO 8601 format).

dialer_status.description: Call status enum: UPCOMING, DIALING, CONNECTED, CANCELED, ENDED, VOICEMAIL_SKIP, DIALER_TREE_SKIP, BUSY_CALL_SKIP, DIFFERENT_TIMEZONE_SKIP, VOICEMAIL_LEFT, NO_NUMBER_TO_DIAL_SKIP, CALL_LIMIT_BY_DAY, CALL_LIMIT_BY_WEEK, COUNTRY_LIMIT

dialer_sub_status.description: Call sub-status enum: CANCELED_BY_CALLER, CANCELED_BY_CALLEE, CALLED_BY_PBX, ZP_ERROR, ANSWER, NOT_ANSWER

disposition_deleted.description: Indicates whether the disposition has been deleted.

auto_disposition.description: Indicates whether the disposition was automatically assigned (true) or manually set (false).

meeting_id.description: Unique identifier of the associated meeting, if available.

processing_analysis.description: Indicates whether call analysis is currently being processed.

call_note.description: Notes or comments about the call.

call_id.description: Unique identifier for the call that was made.

amd_result.description: Answering Machine Detection result enum: MACHINE, HUMAN

call_list_deleted.description: Indicates whether the call list has been deleted.

email_addresses.description: List of email addresses associated with the contact.

schema.description: Root response object containing call history details.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`
User is not a Zoom Owner or Admin

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `6150`
Call history not found with ID: 068b9f5120201001631

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error **Error Code:** `6200`
Internal server error

get.description:
Retrieve call history with pagination and various filtering options. Supports filtering by user, call list ID, or call ID, but not all three simultaneously.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:read:call_history:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Filter by user ID or email (cannot be combined with call_list_id or call_id).

parameters.name: call_list_id
parameters.description: Filter by call list ID (cannot be combined with user_id or call_id).

parameters.name: import_from
parameters.description: Filter by the import source (only valid with user_id): SALESFORCE, CSV, OUTREACH, OPEN_API.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword for filtering by name, called phone number, or call ID.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Sort order: asc or desc (defaults to desc by creation time).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number (defaults to 1).

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items per page (defaults to 20).

parameters.name: call_id
parameters.description: Unique call ID (cannot be combined with other filters).

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`    Successfully retrieved the call history.

has_next_page.description: Whether there is a next page.

call_history_id.description: Unique identifier for the call history record.

disposition_deleted.description: Whether the disposition has been deleted.

transcript.example: [00:00] 16315423526: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone.\n[00:05] 16315423526: Please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.

type.description: Record type enum: UPCOMING, CALLED, SNOOZED, HISTORY, NO_CALL_LIST, REMOVED, CALL_BACK_INBOUND.

user_id.description: ID of the user who made the call.

call_list_deleted.description: Whether the call list has been deleted.

complete_called_number.description: Complete phone number with country code.

create_time.description: Call creation time in UTC (ISO 8601 format).

start_time.description: Call start time in UTC (ISO 8601 format).

dialer_status.description: Call status enum: UPCOMING, DIALING, CONNECTED, CANCELED, ENDED, VOICEMAIL_SKIP, DIALER_TREE_SKIP, BUSY_CALL_SKIP, DIFFERENT_TIMEZONE_SKIP, VOICEMAIL_LEFT, NO_NUMBER_TO_DIAL_SKIP, CALL_LIMIT_BY_DAY, CALL_LIMIT_BY_WEEK, COUNTRY_LIMIT.

dialer_sub_status.description: Call sub-status enum: CANCELED_BY_CALLER, CANCELED_BY_CALLEE, CALLED_BY_PBX, ZP_ERROR, ANSWER, NOT_ANSWER.

auto_disposition.description: Whether disposition was automatically assigned (true) or manually set (false).

processing_analysis.description: Whether call analysis is being processed.

amd_result.description: Answering Machine Detection result enum: MACHINE, HUMAN.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `6151`
At least one filter must be provided: user_id(id or email), call_list_id, or call_id
**Error Code:** `6152`
call_id cannot be combined with other filters: user_id (id or email), call_list_id, import_from, keyword
**Error Code:** `6153`
import_from is invalid
**Error Code:** `6154`
import_from parameter is only valid when filtering by user_id (id or email)
**Error Code:** `6155`
sort_order must be either 'asc' or 'desc'
**Error Code:** `6152`
Cannot provide both call_list_id and user_id (id or email) in the same request
**Error Code:** `6156`
page_size cannot exceed 100. Provided: 150

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`
User is not a Zoom Owner or Admin

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `6021`
User not found with id: 1W6kwwJQRL-1p9bsjdQvmw
**Error Code:** `6150`
Call not found with callId: 068b9f5120201001631
**Error Code:** `6020`
Call list not found with id: iY092GX9TbWfL54HnBxyPQ

**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error **Error Code:** `6200`
Internal server error

get.description:
Retrieve all call lists in the account. Optionally filter by user IDs/emails and source.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:read:call_lists:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs or emails to filter by. Supports mixing IDs and emails.

parameters.name: import_from
parameters.description: Source of call list

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`    Successfully retrieved all call lists for the account

call_lists.description: Array of call lists associated with the account.

call_list_id.description: Unique identifier of the call list.

owner_user_id.description: User ID of the call list owner.

owner_email.description: Email address of the call list owner.

description.example: High-priority contacts for Q5 2025 sales campaign targeting enterprise customers in the technology sector. Focus on companies with 500+ employees and annual revenue over $10M.

create_time.description: Timestamp when the call list was created (ISO-8601 format).

recent_dialed.description: Indicates whether the list contains recently dialed contacts.

items.description: Call list object containing detailed information about each list.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `6153`
The import_from parameter value is invalid.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`
User does not have the required Zoom Owner or Admin privileges.

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error **Error Code:** `6200`
Internal server error.

post.description:
Create a new call list

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:write:call_lists:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

requestBody.description:
Request payload:
`name`: Required, cannot be blank, must be unique within account
`description`: Optional, max length based on system configuration
`prospect_type`: Required, must be CONTACT or LEAD
`assigned_to_user_id`: Required, user id or email must be provided.

description.example: High-priority contacts for Q5 2025 sales campaign targeting enterprise customers in the technology sector. Focus on companies with 500+ employees and annual revenue over $10M.

prospect_type.description: Type of prospects in the list. Valid values: CONTACT, LEAD

assigned_to_user_id.description: User ID or email to assign the list to

201.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `201`    Successfully created the call list.

call_list_id.description: Auto-generated unique identifier for the created call list

name.description: The name of the call list (as provided in request)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the call list was created in UTC (ISO 8601 format)

prospect_type.description: Type of prospects in the list: CONTACT, LEAD

assigned_to_user_id.description: User ID to whom the call list is assigned

assigned_to_user_email.description: Email address of the assigned user

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `6100`
Validation failed. errors field will have further details. Eg: "errors": [ { "field": "name", "message": "Call list name cannot be blank" } ]
**Error Code:** `6000`
Call list name already exists
**Error Code:** `6002`
Maximum number of call lists created via Open API exceeded. Current: 10000, Maximum allowed: 10000
**Error Code:** `6005`
The name cannot exceed 255 characters
**Error Code:** `6006`
The description cannot exceed 1000 characters
**Error Code:** `6007`
ID should not be provided for create operation
**Error Code:** `6010`
Prospect type is required
**Error Code:** `6011`
Prospect type must be either 'CONTACT' or 'LEAD'
**Error Code:** `6022`
Either userId or email must be provided for assignment
**Error Code:** `6201`
Request body is required
**Error Code:** `6004`
Call list name is required
**Error Code:** `6021`
User not found with id: 0yT-QeXeQYqW6uizHEFmXA or email: dev+john_doe_zradialer@zoomsandbox.us

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden User is not a Zoom Owner or Admin

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error Internal server error

delete.description:
Delete a call list and all its associated prospects.

**Limitation:** Currently, deletion is supported only for call lists created through Open APIs. Future updates will expand support to all call lists.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:delete:call_lists:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callListId
parameters.description:
Unique call list ID.

**Note:** Currently, deletion is supported only for call lists created through Open APIs.

204.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `204`
Successfully deleted the call list.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `6003`
Cannot delete call list that was not created via Open API

Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`
User is not a Zoom Owner or an Admin

patch.description:
Update an existing call list.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:update:call_lists:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callListId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the call list.

requestBody.description:
At least one field must be provided for update.

Validation rules:

- At least one field (name, description, prospect_type, or assigned_to_user_id) must be provided for update.
- At least one field must have a different value from the existing call list.
- prospect_type cannot be changed if the list contains prospects.
- Call list cannot be updated if it's currently being dialed.
- Only fields with actual value changes will be updated.
- When reassigning to a different user, all non-history prospects are reassigned and set to "upcoming" status.

**Limitation**: At this time, update is supported only for call lists created through Open APIs. A future update will expand support to all call lists.

name.description: New name for the call list.

description.description: New description for the call list.

prospect_type.description: New prospect type for the call list. Must be Contact or Lead (case insensitive). Note: Cannot be changed if the list contains prospects.

assigned_to_user_id.description: User ID or email to reassign the call list to. User must exist in the account. Either user_id or user_email can be provided.

204.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `204`
No Content [Successfully updated the call list]

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request [Invalid request parameters or validation errors] **Error Code:** `6053`
No changes detected. At least one field (name, prospect_type, description, assigned_to_user) must have a different value from the existing call list.
**Error Code:** `6053`
At least one field must be provided for update operation.
**Error Code:** `6005`
The name cannot exceed 255 characters.
**Error Code:** `6006`
The description cannot exceed 1000 characters.
**Error Code:** `6011`
Prospect type must be either 'CONTACT' or 'LEAD'.
**Error Code:** `6009`
Prospect type cannot be changed when call list has items. Current item size: 5. Please remove all items before changing prospect type.
**Error Code:** `6008`
Call list is currently in use.
**Error Code:** `6100`
Validation failed. errors array will have more information. Eg: { "code": 6100, "message": "Validation failed", "errors": [ { "field": "name", "message": "name exceeds maximum length of 255 characters" }, { "field": "description", "message": "description exceeds maximum length of 1000 characters" } ] }
**Error Code:** `6021`
User not found with ID: 1W6kwwJQRL-1p9bsjdQvmw.
**Error Code:** `6003`
Cannot update call list that was not created via Open API.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden [Insufficient permissions to perform this operation] **Error Code:** `6023`
User is not a Zoom Owner or Admin.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found [Call list not found] **Error Code:** `6001`
Call list does not exist.

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error [An unexpected error occurred] **Error Code:** `6200`
Internal server error.

get.summary: List All Prospects in Call List
get.description:
Retrieve all prospects in a specific call list.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:read:prospects:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callListId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the call list.

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`
Successfully retrieved all prospects for the call list.

prospects.description: List of prospects in the call list.

prospect_id.description: The unique identifier for the prospect.

type.description: Prospect type enum: UPCOMING, CALLED, SNOOZED, HISTORY, NO_CALL_LIST, REMOVED, CALL_BACK_INBOUND

description.description: Additional description or notes about the prospect.
description.example: Experienced sales professional with 10+ years in enterprise software

assignee_user_id.description: The user ID of the person to whom this prospect is assigned.

call_list_id.description: The call list ID that this prospect belongs to.

dialer_status.description: The outcome status of the dialer call: NOT_CALLED, DIALING, CONNECTED, VOICEMAIL, BUSY, NO_ANSWER, CANCELED, FAILED

dialer_sub_status.description: Sub-status of the dialer call: CANCELED_BY_CALLER, CANCELED_BY_CALLEE, CALLED_BY_PBX, ZP_ERROR, ANSWER, NOT_ANSWER

create_time.description: The timestamp when the prospect was created (ISO-8601 format).

modify_time.description: The timestamp when the prospect was last modified (ISO-8601 format).

prospect_type.description: The type of prospect: CONTACT or LEAD.

linkedIn_url.description: The LinkedIn profile URL for the contact.

lead_linkedIn_url.description: The LinkedIn profile URL for the lead.

company_description.example: Leading provider of enterprise software solutions

mailing_zip_code.description: The mailing ZIP or postal code.

import_from.description: The source from which the prospect was imported.

number_of_employees.description: The number of employees in the company.

annual_revenue.description: The annual revenue of the company.

lead_status.description: The current status of the lead.

custom_fields.description: An array of up to 10 custom field values.

type.description: Type of phone number: PRIMARY_PHONE, MOBILE_PHONE, HOME_PHONE, OTHER_PHONE

**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`
User is not a Zoom Owner or an Admin.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `6022`

post.description:
Create and add a prospect to a call list

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:write:prospects:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callListId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call list

requestBody.description:
Prospect to create. Call list can contain a maximum of 10,000 total prospects.

Validation Rules:
- Call list total cannot exceed 10,000 prospects
- At least one name field (primary_name or secondary_name) is required
- At least one phone field is required
- Phone numbers must be in valid format
- Email addresses must be in valid format if provided
- All string fields have maximum length restrictions
- Call list must exist and be created via Open API
- Do not include: id, assignee_user_id, account_id, call_list_id (these are auto-assigned)

company.description: Company name (account name for contacts, company name for leads)

description.example: Experienced sales professional with 10+ years in enterprise software

number_of_employees.description: Number of employees in the company

company_description.example: Leading provider of enterprise software solutions

custom_fields.description: Array of up to 10 custom field values

phone_numbers.description: Phone numbers. At least one phone number is required.

type.description: Type of phone number: PRIMARY_PHONE, MOBILE_PHONE, HOME_PHONE, OTHER_PHONE

201.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `201`    Successfully created prospect for the call list

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `6003`
Call list not created via Open API
**Error Code:** `6042`
Total prospects in call list cannot exceed 10000. Current: 9999
**Error Code:** `6100`
Validation failed. error field will have more details. Eg: { "code": 6100, "message": "Validation failed", "errors": [ { "field": "primary_name", "message": "At least one name field is required" } ] }

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`
User is not a Zoom Owner or Admin.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `6001`
Call list not found with ID: c-ncE_MXQACAjn3_I_35gg

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error [ **Error Code:** `6200`
Internal server error.

patch.description:
Batch update existing prospects. Can also reassign prospects to a different call list.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:update:prospects:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callListId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the current call list.

requestBody.description:
Maximum 1000 prospects per API call.

Validation Rules:
- Each prospect must include the id field
- If not reassigning to different list: at least one updatable field must be provided
- If reassigning to different list assign_to_call_list_id should be provided and no other fields are required
- Prospects must exist and belong to the specified call list
- Target call list (if reassigning) must exist and be created via Open API
- All string fields have maximum length restrictions (configurable)
- Phone numbers must be in valid format
- Email addresses must be in valid format if provided
- Do not include: assignee_user_id, account_id, call_list_id in prospects (auto-managed)

prospects.description: Array of prospect objects to update (maximum 1000 per API call).

prospect_id.description: The unique identifier of the prospect to update (required).

company.description: Company name (Account for contacts, Company for leads).

description.example: Experienced sales professional with 10+ years in enterprise software

lead_linkedIn_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the lead.

linkedIn_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the contact.

company_url.description: Official website URL of the company.

company_description.description: Brief description of the company's business.
company_description.example: Leading provider of enterprise software solutions

mailing_state.description: State or province in the mailing address.

mailing_street.description: Street address including suite or unit number.

mailing_zip_code.description: ZIP or postal code in the mailing address.

custom_fields.description: Array of up to 10 custom field values for additional prospect information.

items.description: Custom field value for storing additional prospect data.

type.description: Type of phone number: PRIMARY_PHONE, MOBILE_PHONE, HOME_PHONE, OTHER_PHONE

assign_to_call_list_id.description: If provided, moves all prospects to a different call list (must be created via Open API).

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`    Successfully updated prospects for a call list.
**HTTP Status Code:** `207`    Multi-Status - Partial success. Some prospects were updated successfully while others failed.

success_list.description: List of prospects that were successfully updated.

prospect_id.description: Unique identifier of the successfully updated prospect.

failed_list.description: List of prospects that failed to update with error details.

prospect_id.description: Unique identifier of the prospect that failed to update.

error_message.description: Specific validation error explaining why the prospect update failed.
error_message.example: VALIDATION_ERROR: Prospect does not belong to call list: _Wze-TJqSQODzsRc53tQPg

items.description: Failed prospect update information with error details.

total_processed.description: Total count of prospects that were successfully updated.

total_failed.description: Total count of prospects that failed to update.

total_prospects.description: Total number of prospects included in the update request.

assigned_to_user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user to whom the prospects are assigned.

assigned_to_user_email.description: Email address of the user to whom the prospects are assigned.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `6201`
At least one prospect must be provided for update
**Error Code:** `6043`
Maximum number of prospects for an API call exceeded - limit is 1000 prospects
**Error Code:** `6003`
Call list not created via Open API
**Error Code:** `6101`
Prospect ID is required for update operation
**Error Code:** `6045`
At least one updatable field must be provided for prospect: mq4XpiQISe6tlhHRwX9a8g
**Error Code:** `6100`
Validation failed. errors filed will have more details. Eg: { "code": 6001, "message": "Validation failed", "errors": [ { "field": "primary_email", "message": "Invalid email format" }, { "field": "primary_phone", "message": "Invalid phone number format" }, { "field": "primary_name", "message": "Field exceeds maximum length of 255 characters" } ] }

**HTTP Status Code:** `403`

post.description:
Batch call to add prospects to a call list.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:write:prospects:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callListId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call list.

requestBody.description:
Maximum 1,000 prospects per API call. Call list can contain maximum 10,000 total prospects.

Validation Rules:
- Maximum 1,000 prospects per API call
- Call list total cannot exceed 10,000 prospects
- At least one name field (primary_name or secondary_name) is required
- At least one phone field is required
- Phone numbers must be in valid format
- Email addresses must be in valid format if provided
- All string fields have maximum length restrictions
- Call list must exist and be created via Open API
- Do not include: id, assignee_user_id, account_id, call_list_id (these are auto-assigned)

prospects.description: Array of prospect objects to create (maximum 1,000 per API call).

company.description: Company name (Account for contacts, Company for leads).

description.example: Experienced sales professional with 10+ years in enterprise software

number_of_employees.description: Number of employees in the company.

lead_linkedIn_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the lead.

linkedIn_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the contact.

company_linkedIn_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL of the company.

company_description.example: Leading provider of enterprise software solutions

mailing_street.description: Street address of the mailing address.

mailing_zip_code.description: ZIP code of the mailing address.

custom_fields.description: Array of custom field values (maximum 10 fields).

phone_numbers.description: Phone numbers for the prospect. At least one phone number is required.

type.description: Type of phone number: PRIMARY_PHONE, MOBILE_PHONE, HOME_PHONE, OTHER_PHONE

201.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `201`    All prospects successfully created.
Note: This status is returned only when ALL prospects in the batch are successfully created. For partial success or all failures, see status codes 207 and 400 respectively.

success_list.description: List of successfully created prospects with generated IDs.

failed_list.description: List of prospects that failed creation with error messages.

error_message.description: Specific validation error explaining why the prospect creation failed.

total_failed.description: Number of prospects that failed validation or creation.

total_prospects.description: Total number of prospects in the request.

assigned_to_user_id.description: User ID to whom all prospects are assigned.

assigned_to_user_email.description: Email address of the assigned user.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `6043`
Maximum number of prospects for an API call exceeded - limit is 1000 prospects
**Error Code:** `6003`
Call list not created via Open API
**Error Code:** `6042`
Total prospects in call list cannot exceed 10000. Current: 9500, Adding: 600, Total would be: 10100

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`
User is not a Zoom Owner or an Admin.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `6001`
Call list not found with ID: c-ncE_MXQACAjn3_I_35gg

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error **Error Code:** `6200`
Internal server error.

delete.description:
Delete a single prospect from a call list by its ID.

**Limitation:** Currently, deletion is supported only for prospects belonging to call lists created through Open APIs. A future update will expand support to all call lists.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:delete:prospects:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callListId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call list.

parameters.name: prospectId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the prospect to delete.

204.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `204`
Successfully deleted the prospect. No response body.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `6003`
Call list not created via Open API
**Error Code:** `6041`
Prospect does not belong to call list: 0yT-QeXeQYqW6uizHEFmXA

**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`

**Error Code:** `6040`

patch.description:
Update an existing prospect. Can also reassign prospect to a different call list.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:update:prospects:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: callListId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the current call list.

parameters.name: prospectId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the prospect to update.

requestBody.description:
Validation Rules:
- If not reassigning to different list: at least one updatable field must be provided.
- If reassigning to different list: assign_to_call_list_id should be provided and no other fields are required.
- Prospect must exist and belong to the specified call list.
- Target call list (if reassigning) must exist and be created via Open API.
- All string fields have maximum length restrictions.
- Phone numbers must be in valid format.
- Email addresses must be in valid format if provided.

company.description: Company name (Account for contacts, Company for leads).

description.description: Additional description or notes about the prospect.
description.example: Experienced sales professional with 10+ years in enterprise software

company_description.example: Leading provider of enterprise software solutions

mailing_street.description: Mailing address street and suite information.

mailing_zip_code.description: Mailing address ZIP or postal code.

assign_to_call_list_id.description: If provided, moves the prospect to a different call list (must be created via Open API).

custom_fields.description: Array of up to 10 custom field values for additional prospect information.

phone_numbers.description: Array of phone numbers for the prospect (maximum 4).

type.description: Type of phone number: PRIMARY_PHONE, MOBILE_PHONE, HOME_PHONE, OTHER_PHONE

email_addresses.description: Array of email addresses for the prospect (maximum 2).

**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `6023`
User is not a Zoom Owner or an Admin.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `6001`
Call list not found with ID: c-ncE_MXQACAjn3_I_35gg
**Error Code:** `6040`

**Error Code:** `6001`

get.description:
Retrieve details of a specific prospect.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `dialer:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_auto_dialer:read:prospects:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

parameters.name: prospectId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the prospect.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`    Successfully retrieved the prospect by ID.

type.description: Prospect type enum: UPCOMING, CALLED, SNOOZED, HISTORY, NO_CALL_LIST, REMOVED, CALL_BACK_INBOUND

description.description: Additional description or notes about the prospect.
description.example: Experienced sales professional with 10+ years in enterprise software

assignee_user_id.description: User ID to whom this prospect is assigned.

call_list_id.description: Call list ID this prospect belongs to.

dialer_status.description: The outcome status of the dialer call: NOT_CALLED, DIALING, CONNECTED, VOICEMAIL, BUSY, NO_ANSWER, CANCELED, FAILED

dialer_sub_status.description: Sub-status of the dialer call: CANCELED_BY_CALLER, CANCELED_BY_CALLEE, CALLED_BY_PBX, ZP_ERROR, ANSWER, NOT_ANSWER

create_time.description: When the prospect was created (ISO 8601 format with timezone).

modify_time.description: When the prospect was last modified (ISO 8601 format with timezone).

linkedIn_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL for the contact.

lead_linkedIn_url.description: LinkedIn profile URL for the lead.

company_description.example: Leading provider of enterprise software solutions

number_of_employees.description: Number of employees in the company.

custom_fields.description: Array of up to 10 custom field values.

type.description: Type of phone number: PRIMARY_PHONE, MOBILE_PHONE, HOME_PHONE, OTHER_PHONE
